content: SSH 6-22 Cordless metal shears Cordless double cut shear for fast cuts in sheet metal and profiles up to 2.5 mm│12 Gauge - with Hilti SSH CS blades included (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Specialty power tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate versatility – high cutting capacity, five different blade types and adjustable speed make this cordless shears perfect for virtually all everyday metal cutting Agile handling – slim, ergonomic grip, balanced body and lock-on switch offer more precision and comfort when cutting metal for extended periods Integrated chip clipper – easily stop the cut anywhere and clear the chip with one hand Faster blade changes – no wrench required to exchange cutters On the Nuron battery platform – cordless metalworking tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, a powerful brushless motor and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Cutting mild or galvanized steel sheet up to 12 Ga – Hilti SSH CS blades recommended (multiple versions available) Cutting stainless steel sheet up to 16 Ga – Hilti SSH CX blades recommended Cutting HVAC spiral and ventilation duct up to 4x 20 Ga – Hilti SSH CD blades recommended Cutting tighter radius curves or circles in sheet metal up to 16 Ga – Hilti SSH CC blades recommended Metal fabrication, building envelope, interior finishing or MEP installation tasks requiring quick and distortion-free cuts ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material type: Flat sheet, C.L.U. profile Rated voltage: 21.6 V Tool body weight: 4.9 lb.
